segments.text: How much for these autographed Elvis records ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thirty bucks a record . Or five for one hundred and twenty bucks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Uh , I'm not sure . Are these all in good condition ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Absolutely . I bought them from the King's estate myself ! Tell you what-I'll let you have five for one hundred bucks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . Five for eighty-five bucks . That's my final offer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , why not ? I'll take ' em .
segments.speaker: S1
